name: Aloha Limone
description: The smell of Aloha Limone has been described as, “a fruit tree rotting in the Kona sun.” Citrus notes are native to this Hawaiian Sunrise and Nina Limone cross, but the plant also expresses latent floral and pungent elements from recessive Kush genetics. Plan on cheeky euphoria and a physical lightness that encourages outdoor activity. Aloha Limone is a proprietary genetic cross of Colorado Seed Inc.
descriptionPlain: The smell of Aloha Limone has been described as, “a fruit tree rotting in the Kona sun.” Citrus notes are native to this Hawaiian Sunrise and Nina Limone cross, but the plant also expresses latent floral and pungent elements from recessive Kush genetics. Plan on cheeky euphoria and a physical lightness that encourages outdoor activity. Aloha Limone is a proprietary genetic cross of Colorado Seed Inc.

highlightedReviews.text: I probably should refrain from reviewing this strain until I try a larger sample but I was pretty impressed so I wanted to do a quick review.  I may come back later and update.  Another find from my guitar buddy.  We had set up a jam session and he gave me a choice of several strains and I grabbed this one.  Not an overpowering aroma but pleasant, with a slight fruit smell.  The draw was just a bit harsh but it could have been the pipe since I'm used to joints.  I thought I read previously Aloha Limone was a hybrid that leaned sativa so figured it would be good choice for the jam session.  Now due to constraints of work I was limited to a decent one hit.  Sucks...but life y'know?  For a simple one hit however, I actually felt a decent kick.  It seemed all sativa to me.  We both were able to rip through some songs and unlike the Chemdawg 4 experience where neither of us could keep our place in a song, we had no problem focusing.  Wish You Were Here...Through The Glass and a couple other tunes were no problem.  This looks like a go-to for future guitar jams.  Can't wait to try a bigger sample and see if the same holds true.
Gives you a clearheaded super high that makes you want to be active and get outside. Love it.
